name: Poku
description:
A challenging puzzle game!

Swipe the cylinders to the color matching plattform. When all cylinders are in the right place, you win! The less time and less moves you make, the more points you get! It may look easy but I promise you that it is quite challenging.

  • 4 difficulty levels to choose from
  • 64 levels to master
  • Google Play Game Service Leaderboards
  • Beautiful color schemes & clean design

Train hard and you will become master!
